title: Textile, 1706–09
dimensions: Warp x Weft (warp hemmed top & bottom; weft selvedge to selvedge): 101.6 x 49.5 cm (40 x 19 1/2 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase from Eleanor G. Hewitt and Smithsonian Institution Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Red warp and yellow weft, in a style called "bizarre" with a stylized leaf and blossom pattern.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1706–09.
1706–09. Medium: silk
Technique: damask, 4 & 1 satin. Museum purchase from Eleanor G. Hewitt and Smithsonian Institution Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1999-44-1.
